dcterms:description: A simple visual gridworld where the goal is to reach a designated green zone starting from a random point. The environment features an increased action space size with multiple room types, where only specific actions are valid in each room.
dcterms:title: MiniGrid Environment

dcterms:description: A text-based game environment where the agent interacts using short sentences. The environment is modified to fit specific needs, featuring a variety of actions that may be rejected based on the current game state.
dcterms:title: TextWorld Environment
